name: Subject Debris (itch)
description:
In Subject Debris, You can play action with puzzle gameplay and relationship system and can easily switch between 2D view and first person view for different situations.

***Story***
You are a failed experiment of a large organization and you are about to be executed to hide secrets. However, you are saved and then join the opposing team to fight and rescue other failed experimental subjects.
Everything will be quite normal until you find out the secrets of the failed test subjects. What you will do?

***Features***
- Stealth action mechanism
- Loot and craft system
- Action in 2d view and solve the puzzle in first person view
- Challenging gameplay
- Hard Boss first
- Relationship system: One will hate, one will like you, it depend on you
